/notes/@@BMS_ID@@.note1: This is the bms component config template for CATL subsystems.
/notes/@@BMS_ID@@.note1a: The bms page of the ui display is outlined in /assets/bms/summay
/notes/@@BMS_ID@@.note1b: The /assets/@@BMS_ID@@ table defines the racks or battery management unit, each has a template file with placements for selected key words
/notes/@@BMS_ID@@.note2: The /config/bms area is still under development
/notes/@@BMS_ID@@.note3: The /components/catl... tables define the incoming control words from the bms modbus interface
/notes/@@BMS_ID@@.note4: The /links/<bms> table  defines mapping of external interface components to internal control variables
/notes/@@BMS_ID@@.note5: There are some junk/test fields as well... they will removed soon

/faults/@@BMS_ID@@.note: Leave as is for now. This definition is needed for clear faults UI cmd to work

/alarms/@@BMS_ID@@.note: Leave as is for now. These definitions are needed for alarms to populate in UI and for clear alarms UI cmd to work

sbmu_warning_1.note: Sbmu Warning table with degrees reg 1 Appendix 3

sbmu_warning_21.note: Sbmu Warning table without degrees reg 1 Appendix 4

sbmu_warning_22.note: Sbmu Warning table without degrees reg 2 Appendix 4

sbmu_warning_23.note: Sbmu Warning table without degrees reg 3 Appendix 4
